site_text.title: SVN user control
site_text.expl:
This is simple SVN user control panel
made by Timi Wahalahti.
New user will not be automatically added to any group, or get permissions to directories.
Removed user rights are not automatically deleted.

Modifying groups:
Seperate users with comma, no spaces!

Setting directory permissions:
New directory is added in form of [/path/to/directory], be sure to add rule for users without group with * = 'permissions'

Directory that already exists, add group rights with the new row like @'group' = 'permissions'

Permissions:
r = only read
rw = read and write
